title: üë§ About Jean Villamor
text:
üíº Professional & Academic Snapshot
This section summarizes my experience; view the full history and project details on the navigation bar above.

Core Experience

Operational Excellence: 12+ years managing the full AP/AR lifecycle, specializing in high-volume processing, vendor management, and internal controls (e.g., cut late fees by 20% and maintain 98% invoice accuracy).
Technical Mastery: Highly proficient in Microsoft Dynamics 365, Sage, QuickBooks, and Advanced Excel.



Strategic Projects

MBA Focus: Applied strategic analysis to complex business problems, including developing an AI/IoT roadmap for Canada Post and defining KPI strategy for the Netflix Ad-Supported Tier.
Academic Highlights: MBA from University Canada West (in progress).

title: üõ†Ô∏è Projects & Case Studies
text:
This page highlights key initiatives where financial discipline and strategic analysis resulted in measurable process improvements.



These case studies demonstrate reliability, accuracy, and process optimization in high-volume finance environments.








Tipüü¢ Goal: Minimize Late Fees and Duplicate Payments






Action: Established stricter AP controls, improved reconciliation processes, and introduced regular vendor statement review.
Result: Successfully cut late fees and duplicate payments by 20%.













Noteüìà Goal: Maintain Exceptional Accuracy on High Volume






Action: Managed high-volume workflows using MS Dynamics 365, DSSI, and Advance Excel for detailed verification and coding.
Result: Consistently processed over 1,000 invoices weekly while maintaining a 98% accuracy rate.













Importantüí∞ Goal: Reduce Exposure to Outstanding Balances






Action: Developed a system for proactive monitoring of aging reports, prioritizing high-risk accounts, and coordinating client follow-ups.
Result: Reduced overdue accounts by 15% within three months.









These projects showcase the application of MBA knowledge to complex business challenges.






Role: Strategic Planner

Scope: Developed an AI/IoT roadmap for operational integration and drafted a comprehensive change management plan (Kotter model).
Skills: Strategic Planning, Technology Road Mapping, Change Management.







Role: Marketing Strategist

Scope: Created a Go-to-Market strategy and defined key performance indicators (KPIs) such as CPA, churn, and ad-tier adds.
Skills: Digital Marketing Strategy, KPI Definition, Competitive Analysis.








Role: Analyst/Evaluator

Scope: Compared Large Language Models (LLMs) on accuracy and bias, ran basic statistical checks on performance, and drafted improvement actions.
Skills: AI Application, Statistical Checks, Bias Mitigation.
